attributes.action: give the North East the power to seperate from England, and be its own country again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The North East of England should be its own Nation under the name of Northumberland.    I say ditch London and Europe so we can rule ourselves.  A seperate Nation from England.   Home rule for Geordieland.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
